Name: Mariel
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A pleasing and interesting combination of flavours, but slightly on the sweet side and for some drinkers (us) lacks oomph.
History: A Bacardí Legacy 2017 winning cocktail created by Kentaro Satoh at Bar Day Cocktail in Yokohama, Japan.
Nutrition: One serving of Mariel contains 160 calories
